resources.contents:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: 'CEC API Documentation'
  description: 'CEC is prindustry platform for manging printing companies.'
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  -
    url: aghanem.prindustry.test
paths:
  /api/v2/in/mgr/auth/login:
    post:
      summary: 'Authenticate by a given credentials and returns the auth tokens'
      operationId: authenticateByAGivenCredentialsAndReturnsTheAuthTokens
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses: {  }
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                email:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be a valid email address.'
                  example: cheyenne44@example.net
                password:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: iusto
              required:
                - email
                - password
      security: []
  /api/v2/in/mgr/auth/refresh-token:
    post:
      summary: 'Refreshing the auth tokens'
      operationId: refreshingTheAuthTokens
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses: {  }
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                refresh_token:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: odio
              required:
                - refresh_token
      security: []
  /api/v2/in/mgr/auth/reset/initiate:
    post:
      summary: "Initiate the password reset process and send an OTP to the user's email"
      operationId: initiateThePasswordResetProcessAndSendAnOTPToTheUsersEmail
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses: {  }
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                email:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be a valid email address.'
                  example: terdman@example.net
                user:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: provident
              required:
                - email
                - user
      security: []
  /api/v2/in/mgr/auth/reset/verify:
    post:
      summary: 'Verification of the OTP'
      operationId: verificationOfTheOTP
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses: {  }
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                email:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be a valid email address.'
                  example: pgleichner@example.com
                token:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: consectetur
              required:
                - email
                - token
      security: []
  /api/v2/in/mgr/auth/reset/change:
    post:
      summary: 'Changing of the user password'
      operationId: changingOfTheUserPassword
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses: {  }
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                email:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be a valid email address.'
                  example: keeling.angel@example.net
                password:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: perspiciatis
                password_confirmation:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: voluptas
              required:
                - email
                - password
                - password_confirmation
      security: []
  /api/v2/in/mgr/account/me:
    get:
      summary: 'Returns a general info of the currently authenticated user'
      operationId: returnsAGeneralInfoOfTheCurrentlyAuthenticatedUser
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses:
        401:
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                example:
                  message: Unauthenticated.
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: Unauthenticated.
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      security: []
  /api/v2/in/mgr/account/logout:
    post:
      summary: 'Logs out of the currently authenticated user'
      operationId: logsOutOfTheCurrentlyAuthenticatedUser
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses: {  }
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      security: []
  /api/v2/in/mgr/apps:
    get:
      summary: 'Returns a list of all available apps (a.k. modules)'
      operationId: returnsAListOfAllAvailableAppsakModules
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses:
        401:
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                example:
                  message: Unauthenticated.
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: Unauthenticated.
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      security: []
  /api/v2/in/mgr/tenants:
    get:
      summary: 'Returns a list of all available tenants'
      operationId: returnsAListOfAllAvailableTenants
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses:
        401:
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                example:
                  message: Unauthenticated.
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: Unauthenticated.
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      security: []
    post:
      summary: 'Create a new tenant'
      operationId: createANewTenant
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses: {  }
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                fqdn:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must match the regex /^[a-z0-9.]+$/.'
                  example: '1'
                salutation:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: sequi
                first_name:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: quae
                middle_name:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: null
                last_name:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: et
                gender:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: in
                email:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be a valid email address.'
                  example: kmcclure@example.org
                password:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: aspernatur
                logo:
                  type: string
                  format: binary
                  description: 'Must be a file.'
                company_name:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must not be greater than 200 characters.'
                  example: ewdrnztqhoupksxjxctkk
                company_description:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must not be greater than 200 characters.'
                  example: roqhgtejosawdnm
                company_coc:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must not be greater than 200 characters.'
                  example: xmogvfgfvdekcrfhtqgrlkie
                role:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: null
                namespaces:
                  type: array
                  description: ''
                  example: null
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      area:
                        type: string
                        description: ''
                        example: amet
                      namespace:
                        type: string
                        description: ''
                        example: quaerat
                custom_fields:
                  type: object
                  description: ''
                  example: null
                  properties: {  }
                manager_language:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must not be greater than 2 characters.'
                  example: o
                supplier:
                  type: boolean
                  description: ''
                  example: false
              required:
                - fqdn
                - first_name
                - last_name
                - gender
                - email
                - password
                - company_name
      security: []
  '/api/v2/in/mgr/tenants/{tenant}':
    put:
      summary: 'Update an existing tenant'
      operationId: updateAnExistingTenant
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses: {  }
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                salutation:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: provident
                first_name:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: itaque
                last_name:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: et
                gender:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: molestiae
                tax_nr:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: null
                email:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be a valid email address.'
                  example: fkoch@example.net
                company_name:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must not be greater than 200 characters.'
                  example: khlcdc
                company_coc:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must not be greater than 200 characters.'
                  example: rcrkrmqdzse
                domain:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must not be greater than 200 characters.'
                  example: bfuesjtdwbgecfkliesmufpp
                namespaces:
                  type: array
                  description: ''
                  example: null
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      area:
                        type: string
                        description: ''
                        example: laudantium
                      namespace:
                        type: string
                        description: ''
                        example: perferendis
                logo:
                  type: string
                  format: binary
                  description: 'Must be a file.'
                supplier:
                  type: boolean
                  description: ''
                  example: true
              required:
                - first_name
                - last_name
                - gender
                - company_name
      security: []
    delete:
      summary: 'Delete a specific tenant'
      operationId: deleteASpecificTenant
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses: {  }
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      security: []
    parameters:
      -
        in: path
        name: tenant
        description: 'The tenant.'
        example: voluptatem
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
  /api/v2/in/mgr/users:
    get:
      summary: 'Returns a list of all available users'
      operationId: returnsAListOfAllAvailableUsers
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses:
        401:
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                example:
                  message: Unauthenticated.
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: Unauthenticated.
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      security: []
    post:
      summary: 'Create a new user'
      operationId: createANewUser
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses: {  }
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                gender:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: other
                  enum:
                    - male
                    - female
                    - other
                first_name:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be at least 2 characters.'
                  example: rvletshkhtgamtoioimaseculaortkqiuhgoziwhhnnfglnl
                last_name:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be at least 2 characters.'
                  example: ytphgu
                dob:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be a valid date.'
                  example: '2025-01-28T14:19:22'
                bio:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: doloribus
                avatar:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: eos
                custom_field:
                  type: object
                  description: ''
                  example: null
                  properties: {  }
                email:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be a valid email address. Must not be greater than 200 characters.'
                  example: lurline14@example.com
                password:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: sit
                username:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: expedita
                company_name:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: voluptatem
                description:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be at least 3 characters.'
                  example: 'Ut quia illo commodi assumenda.'
                tax_nr:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: consectetur
                url:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be a valid URL.'
                  example: 'http://greenfelder.com/est-suscipit-quaerat-et-facilis.html'
                coc:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: maiores
                authorization:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: password
                  enum:
                    - Bearer
                    - password
                authToken:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: eligendi
                authUsername:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: null
                authPassword:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: null
                address:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: velit
                number:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: sunt
                city:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: eligendi
                zip_code:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: sit
                region:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: sit
                country_id:
                  type: integer
                  description: ''
                  example: 19
                type:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: other
                  enum:
                    - invoice
                    - home
                    - work
                    - primary
                    - delivery
                    - other
                default:
                  type: boolean
                  description: ''
                  example: true
                roles:
                  type: object
                  description: ''
                  example: null
                  properties: {  }
              required:
                - first_name
                - last_name
                - email
                - password
                - username
                - company_name
                - description
                - url
                - authToken
                - address
                - number
                - city
                - zip_code
                - country_id
      security: []
  '/api/v2/in/mgr/users/{user}':
    get:
      summary: 'Show a specific user'
      operationId: showASpecificUser
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses:
        401:
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                example:
                  message: Unauthenticated.
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: Unauthenticated.
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      security: []
    put:
      summary: 'Update an existing user'
      operationId: updateAnExistingUser
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses: {  }
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                gender:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: male
                  enum:
                    - male
                    - female
                    - other
                first_name:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be at least 2 characters.'
                  example: tyvvw
                last_name:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be at least 2 characters.'
                  example: bwyctjzrxly
                dob:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be a valid date.'
                  example: '2025-01-28T14:19:23'
                bio:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: enim
                avatar:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: cum
                custom_field:
                  type: object
                  description: ''
                  example: null
                  properties: {  }
                email:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Must be a valid email address. Must not be greater than 255 characters.'
                  example: dixie68@example.com
                roles:
                  type: array
                  description: ''
                  example: null
                  items:
                    type: string
                member:
                  type: boolean
                  description: ''
                  example: false
                teams:
                  type: array
                  description: ''
                  example: null
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        description: ''
                        example: null
                      admin:
                        type: boolean
                        description: ''
                        example: false
                      authorizer:
                        type: boolean
                        description: ''
                        example: true
                type:
                  type: string
                  description: ''
                  example: business
                  enum:
                    - individual
                    - business
                ctx_id:
                  type: array
                  description: ''
                  example:
                    - 12
                  items:
                    type: integer
              required:
                - member
                - type
      security: []
    delete:
      summary: 'Delete a specific user'
      operationId: deleteASpecificUser
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses: {  }
      tags:
        - Endpoints
      security: []
    parameters:
      -
        in: path
        name: user
        description: 'The user.'
        example: natus
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
tags:
  -
    name: Endpoints
    description: ''
